titles.title: Requiring each Member of the House of Representatives to hold at least 12 town meetings per year in the district of the Member.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 11/4/1993--Introduced. Requires each Member of the House of Representatives to hold at least 12 town meetings each calendar year in his or her district. Reduces by two-thirds the amount made available to the Member from the Official Mail Allowance for the next calendar year if the Member does not comply with this Act.
